bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a separation of yin and yang, with life being in great danger. LSZ identifies shen tuo 神脫 as including tuo yin 脫陰 , loss of yin, and tuo yang 脫陽 , loss of yang. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Ba ji 八劑：脫陽者見鬼，脫陰者目盲，此神脫也，非 澀藥所能收也 , “In the case of a loss of yang, one sees demons; In the case of a loss of yin, one turns blind. This is ‘ spirit loss ’. It cannot be retrieved by roughening medication”.
